import seachicon from "../img/seachicon.svg"; import likeDel from "../img/likeDel.svg"; export default function Like({ like, colorMap, getLike, useInput, getValue }) { return (

Your Like

{like.length} pokemon
    {like .filter((item) => item.name.toLowerCase().includes(useInput)) .map((res) => { return (

    • {res.name}

      {res.types[0].type.name} {res.types[1] && res.types[1].type.name}
    • {(res.weight / 10).toFixed(1)}kg {(res.height / 10).toFixed(1)}m
    • {res.id < 10 ? `0${res.id}` : `${res.id}`}
    • pokemon encyclopedia
    • getLike(res.id)}>
    • ); })}
All Delete
); }
